original: intros n l t. generalize dependent l. induction n. - intros l EQ COV. simpl. inversion EQ. intros t_cov. inversion COV. subst. apply cover_one. - intros l EQ COV. destruct l as [|t1 [|t2 l2]]. + discriminate. + discriminate. + simpl in EQ. injection EQ as EQ'. clear EQ. apply all_permutations_inb in COV. apply (in_split_permutation t1 t2 l2) in COV. destruct COV as [s1 [s2 PERM]]. subst. apply (cover_inv_app_aux t (node t1 t2) l2). * apply cover_node with (t1:=t1) (t2:=t2); auto. * left. auto.
